name: James DAWSON, et ux., petitioners, v. Dale W. STEAGER, West Virginia State Tax Commissioner.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
James DAWSON, et ux., petitioners,
v.
Dale W. STEAGER, West Virginia State Tax Commissioner.
attorneys: Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Appeals of West Virginia granted limited to the question presented by the Solicitor General in his brief for the United States as amicus curiae .
casebody.head_matter:
James DAWSON, et ux., petitioners,
v.
Dale W. STEAGER, West Virginia State Tax Commissioner.
No. 17-419.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 25, 2018.
Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Appeals of West Virginia granted limited to the question presented by the Solicitor General in his brief for the United States as amicus curiae .
